content: I updated my IGPublisher (after a few weeks away from IG creation) and I'm now getting an error on one my sample questionnaires from HierarchicalTableGenerator.java saying "Must have rows". I'm assuming that it requires questionnaire instances to have items (the "rows" in the exception?) even though items is 0..*?
hmm. Definitely a bug in new code - can I reproduce this?
I added a fake item to the questionnaire and got past the exception so that was definitely the problem
